metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39320 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The go.mod toolchain directive, introduced in Go 1.21, can be leveraged to execute scripts and binaries relative to the root of the module when the "go" command was executed within the module. This applies to modules downloaded using the "go" command from the module proxy, as well as modules downloaded directly using VCS software.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Packages built using golang need to be rebuilt once the vulnerability has been fixed. This CVE entry does not list packages that need rebuilding outside of the main repository or the Ubuntu variants with PPA overlays. sbeattie> affects golang-1.21 only

criterions.comment: golang-1.21 package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
